mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM t_page_view_statistical_main t where t.u_id=#{id}

SELECT tb.`name`,GROUP_CONCAT(T.createTime ORDER BY T.createTime) AS createTime, GROUP_CONCAT(T.pageView ORDER BY T.createTime) AS pageView, GROUP_CONCAT(T.sales ORDER BY T.createTime) AS sales FROM ( SELECT tpv.brand_id AS brandId,IFNULL(tpv.sales,0) AS sales,IFNULL(tpv.page_view,0) AS pageView,
((DAY(tpv.create_time)+WEEKDAY(tpv.create_time-INTERVAL DAY(tpv.create_time) DAY)) DIV 7 + 1)
DATE_FORMAT(tpv.create_time,'%c')
QUARTER(tpv.create_time)
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tpv.create_time,'%Y'),'年')
WEEK(date_add(tpv.create_time,interval 6 day),2)
AS createTime FROM t_page_view_statistical_main tpv
WHERE tpv.time_frame = 0
WHERE tpv.time_frame = #{param.selectType}
AND DATE_FORMAT(tpv.create_time,#{param.showTime}) = #{param.selectTime}
GROUP BY tpv.brand_id,createTime )T,t_brand tb WHERE T.brandId = tb.u_id GROUP BY T.brandId ORDER BY
SUM(T.pageView)
SUM(T.pageView) DESC
SUM(T.sales)
SUM(T.sales) DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT ts.`name`,GROUP_CONCAT(T.createTime ORDER BY T.createTime) AS createTime, GROUP_CONCAT(T.pageView ORDER BY T.createTime) AS pageView, GROUP_CONCAT(T.sales ORDER BY T.createTime) AS sales FROM ( SELECT tpvv.shop_id,IFNULL(tpvv.sales,0) AS sales,IFNULL(tpvv.page_view,0) AS pageView,
((DAY(tpv.create_time)+WEEKDAY(tpv.create_time-INTERVAL DAY(tpv.create_time) DAY)) DIV 7 + 1)
DATE_FORMAT(tpv.create_time,'%c')
QUARTER(tpv.create_time)
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(tpv.create_time,'%Y'),'年')
WEEK(date_add(tpv.create_time,interval 6 day),2)
AS createTime FROM t_page_view_statistical_main tpv,t_page_view_statistical_vice tpvv
WHERE tpv.time_frame = 0
WHERE tpv.time_frame = #{param.selectType}
AND DATE_FORMAT(tpv.create_time,#{param.showTime}) = #{param.selectTime}
AND tpv.brand_id = #{param.brandId} GROUP BY tpvv.shop_id,createTime )T,t_shop ts WHERE T.shop_id = ts.u_id GROUP BY T.shop_id ORDER BY
SUM(T.pageView)
SUM(T.pageView) DESC
SUM(T.sales)
SUM(T.sales) DESC
LIMIT 10
